text:
<@UMFPSQZA9> I will be glad to help you.
Please explain where you are facing problem.
Thank you so much <@ULQGK1Y2D> my problem here want me to build one page including headers, menu, footer and leadership pictures, may you help me in the steps how to create this page

Hello all,
I am working on this page <https://blog.cph.org/search-results?term=testing>, which displays results from 5 different blogs. We are trying to have each blog post list which blog it is coming from (name or public_title). I have done quite a bit of trial and error with hubl, javascript, and very little api work. I feel like there should be a way to display the blog name or the URL (absolute, not analytic url) of the post. Any ideas or suggestions would be helpful.
Something like {{group.title}}. Not sure exactly, on the phone now.
